00024 XLIA::XLIA(const char *name, bool runtime, 
00025            const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00026            const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00027            const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00028            const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers) : 
00029     XPrimaryDriver(name, runtime, scalarentries, interfaces, thermometers, drivers),
00030     m_valueX(create<XScalarEntry>("ValueX", false, 
00031                                   dynamic_pointer_cast<XDriver>(shared_from_this()))),
00032     m_valueY(create<XScalarEntry>("ValueY", false, 
00033                                   dynamic_pointer_cast<XDriver>(shared_from_this()))),
00034     m_output(create<XDoubleNode>("Output", false)),
00035     m_frequency(create<XDoubleNode>("Frequency", false)),
00036     m_sensitivity(create<XComboNode>("Sensitivity", false, true)),
00037     m_timeConst(create<XComboNode>("TimeConst", false, true)),
00038     m_autoScaleX(create<XBoolNode>("AutoScaleX", false)),
00039     m_autoScaleY(create<XBoolNode>("AutoScaleY", false)),
00040     m_fetchFreq(create<XDoubleNode>("FetchFreq", false)),
00041     m_form(new FrmLIA(g_pFrmMain))
00042 {
00043     fetchFreq()->value(1);
00044   
00045     scalarentries->insert(m_valueX);
00046     scalarentries->insert(m_valueY);
00047 
00048     m_form->statusBar()->hide();
00049     m_form->setCaption(KAME::i18n("Lock-in-Amp - ") + getLabel() );
00050 
00051     m_output->setUIEnabled(false);
00052     m_frequency->setUIEnabled(false);
00053     m_sensitivity->setUIEnabled(false);
00054     m_timeConst->setUIEnabled(false);
00055     m_autoScaleX->setUIEnabled(false);
00056     m_autoScaleY->setUIEnabled(false);
00057     m_fetchFreq->setUIEnabled(false);
00058 
00059     m_conSens = xqcon_create<XQComboBoxConnector>(m_sensitivity, m_form->m_cmbSens);
00060     m_conTimeConst = xqcon_create<XQComboBoxConnector>(m_timeConst, m_form->m_cmbTimeConst);
00061     m_conFreq = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(m_frequency, m_form->m_edFreq);
00062     m_conOutput = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(m_output, m_form->m_edOutput);
00063     m_conAutoScaleX = xqcon_create<XQToggleButtonConnector>(m_autoScaleX, m_form->m_ckbAutoScaleX);
00064     m_conAutoScaleY = xqcon_create<XQToggleButtonConnector>(m_autoScaleY, m_form->m_ckbAutoScaleY);
00065     m_conFetchFreq = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(m_fetchFreq, m_form->m_edFetchFreq);
00066 }
00067 
00068 void
00069 XLIA::showForms() {
00070 //! impliment form->show() here
00071     m_form->show();
00072     m_form->raise();
00073 }
00074 
00075 void
00076 XLIA::start()
00077 {
00078     m_thread.reset(new XThread<XLIA>(shared_from_this(), &XLIA::execute));
00079     m_thread->resume();
00080     m_output->setUIEnabled(true);
00081     m_frequency->setUIEnabled(true);
00082     m_sensitivity->setUIEnabled(true);
00083     m_timeConst->setUIEnabled(true);
00084     m_autoScaleX->setUIEnabled(true);
00085     m_autoScaleY->setUIEnabled(true);
00086     m_fetchFreq->setUIEnabled(true);
00087         
00088 }
00089 void
00090 XLIA::stop()
00091 {  
00092     m_output->setUIEnabled(false);
00093     m_frequency->setUIEnabled(false);
00094     m_sensitivity->setUIEnabled(false);
00095     m_timeConst->setUIEnabled(false);
00096     m_autoScaleX->setUIEnabled(false);
00097     m_autoScaleY->setUIEnabled(false);
00098     m_fetchFreq->setUIEnabled(false);
00099     
00100     if(m_thread) m_thread->terminate();
00101 //    m_thread->waitFor();
00102 //  thread must do interface()->close() at the end
00103 }
00104 
00105 void
00106 XLIA::analyzeRaw() throw (XRecordError&)
00107 {
00108     double x, y;
00109     x = pop<double>();
00110     y = pop<double>();
00111     m_valueX->value(x);
00112     m_valueY->value(y);
00113 }

00115 XLIA::visualize()
00116 {
00117     //! impliment extra codes which do not need write-lock of record
00118     //! record is read-locked
00119 }

00121 void 
00122 XLIA::onOutputChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &)
00123 {
00124     try {
00125         changeOutput(*output());
00126     }
00127     catch (XKameError& e) {
00128         e.print(getLabel() + " " + KAME::i18n("Error while changing output, "));
00129         return;
00130     }
00131 }
00132 void 
00133 XLIA::onFreqChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &)
00134 {
00135     try {
00136         changeFreq(*frequency());
00137     }
00138     catch (XKameError& e) {
00139         e.print(getLabel() + " " + KAME::i18n("Error while changing frequency, "));
00140         return;
00141     }
00142 }
00143 void 
00144 XLIA::onSensitivityChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &)
00145 {
00146     try {
00147         changeSensitivity(*sensitivity());
00148     }
00149     catch (XKameError& e) {
00150         e.print(getLabel() + " " + KAME::i18n("Error while changing sensitivity, "));
00151         return;
00152     }
00153 }
00154 void 
00155 XLIA::onTimeConstChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &)
00156 {
00157     try {
00158         changeTimeConst(*timeConst());
00159     }
00160     catch (XKameError& e) {
00161         e.print(getLabel() + " " + KAME::i18n("Error while changing time const., "));
00162         return;
00163     }
00164 }
00165 
00166 void *
00167 XLIA::execute(const atomic<bool> &terminated)
00168 {
00169 
00170     m_lsnOutput = output()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00171         shared_from_this(), &XLIA::onOutputChanged);
00172     m_lsnFreq = frequency()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00173         shared_from_this(), &XLIA::onFreqChanged);
00174     m_lsnSens = sensitivity()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00175         shared_from_this(), &XLIA::onSensitivityChanged);
00176     m_lsnTimeConst = timeConst()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00177         shared_from_this(), &XLIA::onTimeConstChanged);
00178 
00179     while(!terminated)
00180     {
00181         double fetch_freq = *fetchFreq();
00182         double wait = 0;
00183         if(fetch_freq > 0) {
00184             sscanf(timeConst()->to_str().c_str(), "%lf", &wait);
00185             wait *= 1000.0 / fetch_freq;
00186         }
00187         if(wait > 0) msecsleep(lrint(wait));
00188       
00189         double x, y;
00190         XTime time_awared = XTime::now();
00191         // try/catch exception of communication errors
00192         try {
00193             get(&x, &y);
00194         }
00195         catch (XKameError &e) {
00196             e.print(getLabel() + " " + KAME::i18n("Read Error, "));
00197             continue;
00198         }
00199         clearRaw();
00200         push(x);
00201         push(y);
00202         finishWritingRaw(time_awared, XTime::now());
00203     }
00204   
00205     m_lsnOutput.reset();
00206     m_lsnFreq.reset();
00207     m_lsnSens.reset();
00208     m_lsnTimeConst.reset();
00209 
00210     afterStop();
00211     return NULL;
00212 }
